name: Microcredit Rural Adventure
description:
A regular day tour to rural communities provide tourists unique opportunities to learn about micro finance, agriculture and rural livelihoods, try their hands at farming activities, explore local attractions and meet our pre-screened women borrowers. Part of the tour fee helps fund one of our selected local borrowers. With just a small loan these women can become self-sufficient and provide for themselves and their families. 
  

5 ELEMENTS in A UNIQUE TOUR

EYE-OPENING tour that takes guests truly off-the-beaten path and fosters a multi-dimensional look at ongoing developments in rural Vietnam

INTERACTIVE tours that allows guests to meet, talk and connect with local people who live a world apart from them

LIFE-TRANSFORMING tour that leaves the community better off, with a significant proportion of tour revenue funding a low-interest, non-collateral microloan for a woman borrower in the community.

AUTHENTIC tour that gives guests an opportunity to try their hand at farming activities and immerse themselves in the seasonality of agrarian livelihoods.

ENVIRONMENTAL FRIENDLY tour that makes use of locally available resources and includes deliberate measures to reduce our carbon footprint.
